paper_abstract: NECROMANCER, A ROBUST AND HETEROGENEOUS CORE COUPLING EXECUTION SCHEME, EXPLOITS A FUNCTIONALLY DEAD CORE TO IMPROVE SYSTEM THROUGHPUT BY SUPPLYING HINTS REGARDING HIGH-LEVEL PROGRAM BEHAVIOR. NECROMANCER PARTITIONS A CMP SYSTEM'S CORES INTO MULTIPLE GROUPS, EACH OF WHICH SHARES A LIGHTWEIGHT CORE THAT CAN BE SUBSTANTIALLY ACCELERATED USING EXECUTION HINTS FROM THE FAULTY CORE.
